text: John Lancelot Blades Percival, known as Lance Percival (26 July 1933 - 6 January 2015), was an English actor, comedian and after-dinner speaker. He was known for making the voices of Paul McCartney and Ringo Starr in the animated series The Beatles. Percival died in January 2015, aged 81. He will be cremated at Putney Vale Cemetery on 20 January 2015.'Up Pompeii star Percival dies' BBC News, retrieved 9 January 2015 ==References== ==Other websites== * * Obituary * Obituary - BBC Category:1933 births Category:2015 deaths Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors Category:Comedians from Kent Category:Actors from Kent
title: Lance Percival
